\section{\emph{ficafic}}
\subsection{Usage}
\getuse{ficafic --help}
\subsection{Examples}
\begin{verbatim}
> ficafic fic06.187 fica06.187

input - ASCII FIC file

BLK    109    0   32    0
        1382          18   583099966   561736112   375652454   154723549

\subsection{Notes}
